summary: Change the combat style of Serena, also a little bit of appearance. Install before you start the dawnguard quest.
descriptionHtml:
"Magic is shunned by most. If it can't be swung over your head and used to crack skulls, most Nords want nothing to do with it" -Onmund

Serana is a true Nord, and that is it.

Requirements:
Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8
Dawnguard DLC

Installation:
Install via NMM and follow the install wizard instructions.
Or just drop the .esp file into Data folder and check in launcher.
!! Install before you start the dawnguard quest!!
!! Serana use vanilla mesh and texture, so her appearance depends on which face type you use!!

Recommend:
univision Face - by DD AKT
DIMONIZED UNP female body - by dimon99

Credits:
Ponytail Hairstyles v3_0 - by Azar
author: Aka
